turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order for a Starbucks drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Which starbucks are you closest to?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande cappuccino with 2% milk, no syrups.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. So that's a grande cappuccino with 2% milk no syrups on main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll place the order and it will be ready soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: YOu'll get the text via receipt enjoy.
